title: The Importance of Accountability & Finding Your People
itunes:title: The Importance of Accountability & Finding Your People
description:
We talk about goal setting, resolutions, strategizing, and more; but none of that will get us too far without a supportive community! We're looking at a finance adjacent topic regarding accountability and how these intentional relationships can help us stick to and achieve our goals!

Get full show notes here!

  • Get our FREE 7-Day No-Spend Challenge Workbook here! https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/free 
  • Join the waitlist for Club BFF: https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/club-bff-waitlist/ 
  • Subscribe for more on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/frugalfriends 
  • Hang out with us on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/frugalfriendspodcast/ 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
